Sentence: On her (Vicario) wedding night, after discovering that she (Vicario) was not a virgin, Angela's husband, Bayardo San Roman, returns her (Angela) to her (Angela) house
The day that Santiago is murdered was a significant day in town because the Bishop was coming by boat to bless the marriage of Angela Vicario and Bayardo San Roman

Because Bayardo came from a prestigious, wealthy family, and the Vicarios were relatively poor, Angela did not really have a choice, even though she (Angela) did not love Bayardo at the time they were wed
After Bayardo returned Angela to her (Angela) home on their wedding night, she (Angela) fell in love with him (Pedro)
